About

A sequence is an ordered collection of related content.

Try using them for:

  • Reading lists: keep track of what you have read (or watched, or heard)
  • Favourites: keep track of what you found interesting / useful
  • Compilations: collect and publish the best content on some topic

Once you have created a sequence, you can export it to epub, pdf or markdown formats (more formats available on request!).

If you think your sequence is good enough for this page, leave some feedback and I may curate it.
